description: This is a shell script used for managing GRE tunnels and hotspot configurations, including setting up network interfaces, creating tunnels, and configuring system parameters for hotspot and GRE connectivity.

methods.name: init_snooper_sysevents
methods.description: Initializes snooper system events by enabling circuit and remote snooping.

methods.name: read_init_params
methods.description: Retrieves initial configuration parameters from the PSM database for hotspot and GRE tunnel setup.

methods.name: create_tunnel
methods.description: Sets up the GRE tunnel and related network interfaces, including bridges and VConfigs.

methods.name: init_keepalive_sysevents
methods.description: Configures system events related to hotspot keep-alive parameters.

methods.name: update_bridge_config
methods.description: Updates iptables rules for hotspot traffic forwarding and NFQUEUE filtering.
